examples.reference: I think it is a lower-performing company.
examples.recognised: I think it is a lower performing company.

examples.reference: When we lost, I laughed and cried, perhaps too much of the latter but had it not been for this guy supporting me I would've just cried.
examples.recognised: When we lost, I laughed and cried but had it not been for this guy supporting me I would've just cried.

examples.reference: This is my sister, who works at the hospital.
examples.recognised: This is my sister. Who works at the hospital?
examples.reason: incorrect punctuation that changed statement to question

examples.reference: This man is a suspected murderer.
